text: The European Network for Accreditation of Engineering Education authorises quality assurance and education accreditation agencies within the European higher education area, to award the EUR-ACE label to their accredited engineering degree programmes.Welcome to ENAEE == Agencies authorised to award the EUR-ACE label == * FEANI - The European Federation of National Engineering Associations. * ASIIN – Fachakkreditierungsagentur für Studiengänge der Ingenieurwissenschaften, der Informatik, der Naturwissenschaften, und der Mathematik e.V. Germany Akkreditierung international * CTI – Commission des titres d'ingénieur, France La CTI est membre fondateur de EUR-ACE (Accréditation des formations d’ingénieurs en Europe). * Engineering Council UKInternational strategy * Engineers Ireland International Passport * Ordem dos Engenheiros, Portugal Sistema OE+EUR-ACE como Factor de Distinção e Promoção da Qualidade da Formação * AEER – Association for Engineering Education in Russia. * MÜDEK – Association for Evaluation and Accreditation of Engineering Programmes, Turkey Ahmet Aran, Yavuz Erçil, and Bülent Özgüler Attending 24th Engineering Deans Council Meeting ==References== Category:Qualifications Category:Educational organizations Category:European organizations
title: European Network for Accreditation of Engineering Education
